author: Annie Lord, Annie Lord
title: HBO to stream 500 hours of free TV, including Succession, The Sopranos and The Wire
description: The US television network is trying to help people keep entertained as they stay at home
content:
From today, HBO is offering free streaming of The Sopranos, The Wire, Successionand other classic shows, with no subscription required.
The limited time offer will be available on HBO Now and HBO Go apps, in addition to those platforms' respective websites.… [+1550 chars]
